name: Astrodog VS Aliens
description:
Astrodog VS Aliens

Press Space or Enter to play

Player 1 (Astrodog) controls the spaceship (with arrows, ZQSD or any usb controller), he must avoid items.

Player 2 (or BOT) spawns items on the upper part of the screen with mouse left click. The next items are show in the item list.

You can change the settings easily between each game.

Change the falling speed of items,

Change the global time, 

Change Player 1 life points,

Change Player 2 cooldown,

Set automatic spawning...

Items :

Asteroids and aliens  will hurt (one life point for asteroids, three for aliens)

Satelites will not hurt you but will make you loose control for 1.25 seconds. (Input Axis will be inverted)

Song : Bag Riders - Shooting Stars
